lp-title: We Connect the People That Matter
lp-desc: Requirements Bazaar allows users to discuss innovative ideas so that developers can focus on features that really matter.
landing-step-3: 3. Respond to requirements from your community
landing-featureDiscussText: Discuss new ideas, and innovate together with your end-users.
landing-featureVoteText: Let users vote for requirements to help developers prioritizing the right features.
landing-featureGitHubText: Link your project to a GitHub repository to keep requirements engineering and development in sync.
landing-featuredProjects-text: Check out some of our most interesting projects to get to know Requirements Bazaar in more detail.
landing-reqBazProject-description: New ideas for Requirements Bazaar itself are also tracked and discussed directly on the platform. Feel free to submit your own ideas or discuss the project with other users.
landing-reqBazProject-cardPlaceholder: Click here to open the Requirements Bazaar project!
projects-exploreText: Take a look at the public projects on Requirements Bazaar.
projects-signInToCreateProjectMessage: You need to sign in to create a project.
signInToCreateCategory: You need to sign in to create a category.
signInToCreateRequirement: You need to sign in to create a requirement.
signInToFollowProject: You need to sign in to follow a project.
signInToFollowCategory: You need to sign in to follow a category.
signInToVoteRequirement: You need to sign in to vote for a requirement.
linkRepository-pasteUrlInstruction: To get started, first, paste the base URL of a GitHub Repository that should be connected to this project.
linkRepository-urlInvalid: Please enter a valid GitHub repository URL
gitHubSetup-configureWebhookInstruction: Now, you need to configure a webhook for the GitHub repository that should be connected to this project.
gitHubSetup-eventsLabel: Which events would you like to trigger this webhook?
gitHubSetup-eventsLabel-optionSpecificEv: 'Select inividual events': Issues, Pull Requests, and Releases
projectDetails-warningRemoveYourself: You'll remove yourself from the project!
projectDetails-areYouSureYouWantToRemove: Are you sure you want to remove member
onlyMyProjects: Only show projects owned by me
pr-desc: This is the list of all projects.
searchLabel: Filter the list by project name or description
filterCategoriesLabel: Filter the list by category name or description
deleteProjectDesc: This action can't be undone! Are you sure that you want to permanently delete this project?
deleteCompDesc: This action can't be undone! Are you sure that you want to permanently delete this category?
noRequirement: Requirement doesn't exist. Redirected you to category page.
fieldsNotEmptyReq: Requirement isn't posted! Fields should not be empty!
errorCreReq: Some error occurred while creating the requirement!
fieldsNotEmptyPrj: Project isn't posted! Fields should not be empty!
errorCrePrj: Some error occurred while creating the project!
categoryCreateError: Some error occurred while creating the category!
projectEditError: Unfortunately the changes could not be saved. Please try again.
categoryEditSuccess: The edit on the category has been saved.
categoryEditError: Unfortunately the changes could not be saved. Please try again.
delCommDesc: This action can't be undone! Are you sure that you want to permanently delete this comment?
deleteRequirementDesc: This action can't be undone! Are you sure that you want to permanently delete this requirement?
createIssueDialogMessage: You will be redirected to GitHub
requirementAlreadyOnGitHub: This Requirement is already on GitHub.
creator: Creator
fdbFollowReq: You are now following this requirement.
fdbUnfollowReq: You are not following this requirement anymore.
fdbDevelopReq: You are now a developer of this requirement.
fdbUndevelopReq: You are not developing this requirement anymore.
mailDefaultLeader: Get e-mail notifications from requirements you lead
mailDefaultFollow: Get mails from requirements you follow
takeAlook: Take a look at a few example projects and if we have convinced you create your own!
confirmationCategoryFollow: You are now following this category.
confirmationCategoryUnfollow: You are not following this category anymore.
confirmationProjectUnfollow: You are not following this project anymore.
confirmationProjectFollow: You are now following this project.
voteSuccessful: You have successfully voted for this requirement.
unvoteSuccessful: You have successfully removed your vote for this requirement.
dashboard-projects: Recent activities in projects you follow
dashboard-categories: Recent activities in categories you follow
dashboard-requirements: Recent activities in requirements you follow
home-description: This is your personal dashboard with every update you need.
